mapper.select: SELECT com.title,com.company_id,ca.ss_account,emp.employee_name,emp.employee_id,emp.id_num,'退账' as ty,er.start_month,er.end_month,'' as com_amount,'' as emp_amount,er.amount from ss_emp_refund er INNER JOIN ss_emp_archive ea ON er.emp_archive_id=ea.emp_archive_id INNER JOIN sal_company com ON com.company_id=ea.company_id INNER JOIN emp_employee emp ON emp.employee_id=ea.employee_id INNER JOIN ss_com_account ca ON ca.com_account_id = ea.com_account_id WHERE er.ss_month=#{ssMonth} AND ca.ss_account=#{ssAccount} AND er.is_active=1 UNION ALL select com.title,com.company_id,ca.ss_account,emp.employee_name,emp.employee_id,emp.id_num,'调整' as ty,eba.start_month,eba.end_month, eba.com_diff_sum_amount as com_amount,eba.emp_diff_sum_amount as emp_amount,eba.comemp_diff_amount as amount from ss_emp_base_adjust eba INNER JOIN ss_emp_archive ea on ea.emp_archive_id=eba.emp_archive_id INNER JOIN sal_company com ON com.company_id=ea.company_id INNER JOIN emp_employee emp ON emp.employee_id=ea.employee_id INNER JOIN ss_com_account ca ON ca.com_account_id = ea.com_account_id where eba.ss_month=#{ssMonth} AND ca.ss_account=#{ssAccount} AND eba.comemp_diff_amount < 0 AND eba.is_active=1
